#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
int main()
{
	char input[3005],sorted[3005];
	int testcase,index,sort[26],i,length,j,count,k,t1,t[3005];
	scanf("%d",&testcase);
	while(testcase--)
	{
		scanf("%s%d",sorted,&index);
		length = strlen(sorted);
		index = length-index;
		k=0;
		for(i=length-1;i>=0;i--)
			input[k++] = sorted[i];
		input[k] = '\0';
		memset(sort,0,sizeof(sort));
		for(i=0;i<length;i++)
		{
			j = (int)input[i]-'a';
			sort[j]++;
		}
		count=0;
		for(i=0;i<26;i++)
			if(sort[i]>0)
				for(j=0;j<sort[i];j++)
				{
					sorted[count++] = (char)(i+'a');
				}
		t1=0;
		for(i=0;i<26;i++)
		{
			if(sort[i]>0)
			{
				k=0;
				for(j=0;j<sort[i];j++)
				{
					while(k<length)
					{
						if(input[k]==(char)(i+'a'))
							t[t1++]=k;
						k++;
					}
				}
			}
		}
		for(i=0;i<length;i++)
		{
			sorted[i] = input[index];
			index = t[index];
		}
		sorted[i] = '\0';
		printf("%s\n",sorted);
	}
}
